home.title: Gabriel Stik
home.text: I am Gabriel Stik, french student in 3rd grade at HETIC where I learnt the basics of the internet. I’m looking for an internship anywhere in the world. Feel free to contact me.

the-charles-nyc.name: The Charles NYC
the-charles-nyc.excerpt: I had the opportunity to work at The Charles, which is a digital agency based in Manhattan, New York. I worked on many websites' developement, internal tools, and more using recent technologies.

content.text: I had the opportunity to work at The Charles, which is a digital agency based in Manhattan, New York. I worked on many websites' developement, internal tools, and more using recent technologies.
The Charles had its website redesigned and I spent a lot of time on it. I mainly worked on improving animations & performances.

content.title: Gatsby is the key.
content.text: The website needed to be able to show all the content of The Charles. Indeed a lot of projects means a lot of assets. And a lot of assets need strong performances. That's why I chosed to make it run with Gatsby and Wordpress hooks.

content.title: Understand user paths to smartly websites.

content.text: As long as I worked on The Charles' productions I figured out how important it is to understand how the user navigates through the website. Thus it's important during the development process to take into consideration the way the websites load according to user paths.

content.title: Guide the user through the shopping experience.

content.text: In order to make the user experience better. We built a assessment form on the website to help the user find the product they need.

content.title: React.js embed.
content.text: That assessment was built with React in order to have a fluid navigation through it. That allowed to keep data easily while the form is being filled out and to offer the customer the right products at the end.
But I can't tell everything on internet. Reach me out to know more!

maud-rochel.name: Maud's folio
maud-rochel.excerpt: I developed the portfolio of my favorite designer and friend: Maud Rochel. I wanted to build something she can edit easily when she want.

content.text: I developed the portfolio of my friend and designer: Maud Rochel. I wanted to build something she can edit easily when she want.

content.title: Nuxt & Wordpress
content.text: Because having a backoffice on portfolio is essential, I chose to use Wordpress with Advanced Custom Field. As the objective is to quickly access the data to display them, I gave up to use directly the Wordpress Rest API.

content.title: I made a Wordpress plugin especially for this folio.

content.text: Maud needed to have the ability to update her portfolio instantly with Wordpress. So I decided to create a plugin that writes a json file each time Maud's saves or creates a post on Wordpress. The frontend works by pulling that json. Moreover, we can version the website by keeping those json data files and have static version of it.

startupflow.name: Startupflow
startupflow.excerpt: My friend Maud Rochel and I worked with Startupflow in order to create their website.

content.text: In 2018 I already worked on the first version of Startupflow.io. In 2020 the startup wanted a new version of their website. With my friend & designer Maud Rochel we worked on it in order to make it in line with the company's branding and to use the most suitable technologies.

content.title: Working hand in hand with the designer.

streetco.name: Street Co.
streetco.excerpt: Street connection is a web documentary about the issue of culture in the suburbs. Paris, Miami, Moscow, Rio. Beyond the clichés of violence and crime, all these neighbourhoods have in common that they have created the contemporary cultural image of their city.

content.text: Street connection is a web documentary about the issue of culture in the suburbs. Paris, LA, Moscow, Rio. Beyond the clichés of violence and crime, all these neighbourhoods have in common that they have created the contemporary cultural image of their city.

content.title: Four days to make a webdocumentary.

content.text: That was challenging. At school, we had to make a team of five and create a webdocumentary in 4 days. The team was made of 1 manager, 1 UI desdigner, 1 sound designer and 2 developers.

la-montgolfiere.name: La Montgolfière
la-montgolfiere.excerpt: The Montgolfière is a trendy sports hall in Paris. As an intern at Purée Maison, I developed this site with another intern.

content.text: The Montgolfière is a trendy sports hall in Paris. As an intern at Purée Maison, I developed this site with another intern.

content.title: GSAP!
content.text: We used GSAP for all the animations. Timelines are extremely useful to coordinate content appearances, and manage the timing and easing of each animation.

Of course this website has a backoffice : it's a Wordpress with Advanced Custom Field. The client needed to have the whole website editable. So we created a lot of compenent that he can mangage with ACF's flexible content field.

chapters.title: Hello
chapters.text:
For 3 years I have been studying at HETIC digital know-how, learning both creation and development, as well as project management. I love to build relevant and user-centric products.

Last year I was led to do a 3-month internship and I was delighted to be part of the developers team at Purée Maison, where I met brilliant people whose gave me the opportunity to work on awesome projects.

I am also a freelance developer so I have the opportunity to work with differents clients along with my studies.
